SEARCH
Package org.mazeApp.model.algorithms

Class UserPlaySolver

java.lang.Object
org.mazeApp.model.algorithms.UserPlaySolver
public class UserPlaySolver extends Object
Allows a user to manually navigate through a maze using keyboard input (ZQSD). Supports visual feedback in the MazeView and optional victory sound effects.
Since:
1.0

    Constructs the interactive solver and prepares the victory label and sound.

    • UserPlaySolver

      public UserPlaySolver(MazeView mazeView, Graph graph)
      Constructs the interactive solver and prepares the victory label and sound.
      Parameters:
      mazeView - the MazeView used to render the maze and player
      graph - the Graph representing the maze structure to navigate

  • Method Details

    • attachToScene

      public void attachToScene()
      Attaches the solver to the MazeView and sets up key listeners for user control. Initializes the player avatar and victory label.

      public ArrayList<Integer> getFinalPath()
      Returns the final path through the maze.
      Returns:

      public ArrayList<Integer> getPathVisitedSquares()

    • getEndTime

      public long getEndTime()
      Returns the end time of the maze-solving operation.
      Returns:
